page.title: 15Dyfed's Changing Population
page.content: Many people have moved into the area during this century especially during th last 25 years. Many of the farms ar family farms which were bought by the tenants of the mansions. Several of the original mansions. Several of the original mansion owners were not nativesof the area but they were the means of livelihood for many families by employing servants, maids, gardeners etc. Nowadays there is an influx of another kind, people looking for a quiet place to retire or trying to live a self-sufficient life; others settling, bringing up children, learning the Welsh language and ecoming part of the rural community. There has been a reduction in the population, where there used to be 10 or more children in a family there are now 2 or 3. The number of Welsh speakers has declined.
